getAll: select number, name, weightKg, breed, yearOfBirth from dog
getOne: select number, name, weightKg, breed, yearOfBirth from dog where number=?
insert: insert into dog (number, name, weightKg, breed, yearOfBirth) values(?,?,?,?,?)
update: update dog set name=?, weightKg=?, breed=?, yearOfBirth=? where number=?
